summary: Implement header navigation hover-based dropdown menus with smooth, non-flickering behavior and automatic switching between menu items.

existing_features.title: Update the desktop header navigation dropdown interaction so dropdowns open on hover and close immediately when the pointer leaves BOTH the top-level menu item area and the dropdown panel area (no click required). The hover logic must work reliably even though the dropdown panel is rendered outside the triggerâ€™s DOM subtree (portal), and must avoid flicker when moving the pointer between the trigger and the dropdown panel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Header nav hover dropdowns: show on hover, hide immediately when leaving menu+dropdown area, auto-switch on hovering other items, smooth/no flicker, no click required
